instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
Originally, short on PP3V42_G3H with corrosion on C5002, C5007 and C5008

These were replaced.
Short gone.
Green light on charger, fan spin. No image.
PRAM reset. Nochange.

PPBUS_G3H: 8.58V

L7310: 1.80
L7320: 1.80V

L7430: 1.20
L7560: 3.36

L7520: 5.16
L7130: 8.58

L3095:
PIN1: 0V
PIN2: 0V

C3080:
1: 8.58
2: 8.19

R3080: 465 Ohms

L7701:
1:0V
No short by ohm mesurement on L7701

F7700 Fuse is good

Q7706
4:8.58
3: 8.32
1: 0V and no short

Q7707

EDP_BKLT_EN: 0V
BKLT_PLT_RST_L: 3.2V

Replace U7701?. NO change

USB port lights up a USB hub.

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
Do you get PLT_RESET_L?

Just in case, inspect U1950 for corrosion.

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
3.35V on PLT_RESET_L
U1950 looks good

looking at Q3080:
PIN 4: 8.57
PIN 1: 8.19

PIN 2: 0V

PP5V_s5: 5.15
PP3V3_S4: 3.35
PP3V3_S3: 3.36
pp3V3_s0: 0V
PP5V_S4RS3: 5.15
PP3V3_s5: 3.35
PP3V3_SUS: 3.35
PP3V3_S4SW: 3.35

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
Do you get USB actibvity?
Check it properly, not only for 5V on USB port.
Caps Lock reacts?

Try known good BIOS, just in case.

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
cpu is warm
how do i check the usb.
I plugged in a mouse, it does not light up and stay on but it does briefly flash when plugged in.

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
Would you recommend using the CMI Zapper "Clean ME region" function in this case?
I have backed up the MAC ROM to the CMI Zapper and to a PC (.BIN file).

I am reading: [URL]https://ghostlyhaks.com/blog/apple-efi/25-clean-me-region[/URL]

but is there another tutorial source and where can I find a clean ME region file for 820-00165-A

threads.title: 820-00165 Board fan spin, but no image
threads.message:
Medusa can clean ME region.
You can also find clean BIOS, already posted on the forum.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mTP3wgNUbRhxvjZ8Qfo4Mq8Sg4ENmVbw/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
